acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Sri Sanjay Sahani is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next date. Having very carefully gone through the submissions duly advanced by the learned lawyers and case diary I find there is a ground for presuming that the accused committed the offence under sections 363 IPC/ 4 of the POCSO Act and accordingly charges are framed. The particular of the offence charge is duly read over and explained to the accused person to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed to be pried. Issue summons to PWs.          Seen the bail petition filed by the victim herself claiming to be wife of the accused praying for allowing the accused to go on bail on the ground stated in the petition supported by an affidavit. Heard learned lawyers of the both sides. The bail prayer will be considered on recording of deposition of the victim.

Accused Sanjay Sahani is produced from Jail Hazat and he is remanded till next date.      PWs Smt. Hiramati Devi is present.. She is examined and her cross examination is declined. Issue fresh summons to rest PWs

Accused Sanjay Sahani is produced from the jail hazot and he is again remanded till next date.           Heard learned lawyer appearing on behalf of the petitioner of the bail petition being petition No. 1359/2019 dated 29.06.2019. Also heard learned Public Prosecutor. Considering all aspects the bail prayer is allowed. Accordingly the accused Sri Sanjay Sahani @ Baklu is allowed to go on bail of Rs. 10,000/- with a local surety of like amount. Issue summons to all PWs.         Fixing 29.07.2019 for evidence.

Accused   representedPWs Sri Hareswar Bora and M.O Dr. Mercy Rongpharpi are present. PW Sri Hareswar Bora is examined, cross-examined and discharged.  PW M.O Dr. Mercy Rongpharpi is examined and her cross-examination is declined and she is discharged. Summons issued to rest PWs returned unserved with report. Issue fresh summons as per report.
accused present.Complainant absent. issue fresh summons
Accused Sanjay Sahani is present.      PW Omprakash Mahatto is present. He is examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs.             Fixing 22.11.2019 for  F/Evidence.
Accused Sanjay Sahani is present.PW Smt. Geeta Devi is examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summon to I.O

Court work is disrupted due to Assam bandh.       Accused  person is absent.     I.O absent. Summon and W.T message not returned. Issue fresh summon and W.T message to I.O.       Fixing 28.01.20 for I.O
Present- Sri Kalyanjit Saikia(AJS)Addl. Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu   Case record is received from Honble Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.
accd Sanjay sahani present,        IO absent, summons issued to IO not returned, , issue fresh summons to IO Jyotirmoy Gayan through SP Majuli
